metadata.title: CVE-2023-45853 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: MiniZip in zlib through 1.3 has an integer overflow and resultantheap-based buffer overflow in zipOpenNewFileInZip4_64 via a long filename,comment, or extra field. NOTE: MiniZip is not a supported part of the zlibproduct.

criterions.comment: zlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rsync: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
